agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Defense & Veterans' Affairs TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess Monday, February 25, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. Dan Flynn Invited Testimony from state agencies related to veteran services. Bills deleted after last posting: HB 166 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
